data.title: Marine Corps Aviation Association
data.meta_description: MCAA has the largest aviation-based award program in the country. We recognize individuals & squadrons in the U.S. Marine Corps for excellence in Marine aviation.
data.text:
The Marine Corps Aviation Association (MCAA) is honored to announce the 2024 MCAA Aviation Award Recipients. These Marines received their Awards at the 2024 Symposium in Dallas, TX, on May 23rd, 2024.

Alfred A. Cunningham Award (Aviator of the Year):

Maj Shane R. Gentry, VMU-3, 1st MAW

Robert Guy Robinson Award (NFO of the Year):

Capt William J. Bursaw, MAG-31, 2d MAW

Earle Hattaway Award (Aviation Ground Officer of the Year):

Capt Matthew C. Weber, MALS-26, 2d MAW

Robert F. Gibson Award (Air Command and Control Officer of the Year):

Capt Kevin V. Cao, MASS-3, 3d MAW

Silver Hawk Award (Earliest Naval Aviation Designation Date):

LtGen Matthew G. Glavy, Deputy Commandant for Information

Frank E. Petersen Jr. Award (Flight Student of the Year):

1stLt Jack A. Cleary, MATSG-21

Danny L. Radish Award (Enlisted Aircrewman of the Year):

GySgt Taylor C. Coughlin, MAWTS-1

Willie D. Sproule Award (Maintenance Marine of the Year):

GySgt Christopher A. Stamps, VMM-162, 2d MAW

Kenneth W. Southcomb Award (Aviation Supply Marine of the Year):

MSgt Dylan A. Theberge, MALS-12, 1st MAW

Paul G. Vess Award (Avionics Marine of the Year):

Sgt Ryan C. Hart, VMM-162, 2d MAW

Gaines B. Gilbert Award (Aviation Ordnance Marine of the Year):

Sgt Spencer G. Neitzke, VMX-1

Kenneth A. Innis Award (Command and Control Marine of the Year):

GySgt Daniel J. Tovar, 3d LAAB, 3d Marine Division

Jack W. Demmond Award (Aviation Ground Marine of the Year):

Cpl Nathan A. Barr, MWSS-171, 1st MAW

James E. Nicholson Award (NCO Leadership):

Sgt Luis A. Morales, Jr., MWSS-373, 3d MAW

Michael A. Hough Award (Acquisition Excellence):

LtCol Leigh G. Irwin, PMA-266

James Maguire Award (Exceptional Achievement):

Capt Scott A. MacDonald, VMU-1, 3d MAW

â€‹

Commandants Aviation Trophy (Outstanding Performance of a Marine Aviation Squadron or Battalion):

VMX-1

Robert M. Hanson Award (Fighter/Attack Squadron of the Year):

VMFA-242, 1st MAW

Lawson H. M. Sanderson Award (Attack Squadron of the Year):

VMA-231, 2d MAW

Henry Wildfang Award (Aerial/Refueler/Transport Squadron of the Year):

VMGR-352, 3d MAW

Fred McCorkle Award (Marine Medium Tiltrotor Squadron of the Year):

VMM-162, 2d MAW

Keith B. McCutcheon Award (Marine Heavy Helicopter Squadron of the Year):

HMH-462, 3d MAW

John P. Giguere Award (Marine Light/Attack Helicopter Squadron of the Year):

HMLA-169, 3d MAW

John I. Hudson Award (Marine Unmanned Aircraft Squadron of the Year):

VMU-1, 3d MAW

Donald E. Davis Award (Marine Aviation Logistics Squadron of the Year):

MALS-36, 1st MAW

James E. Hatch Award (Marine Wing Support Squadron of the Year):

MWSS-372, 3d MAW

Edward S. Fris Award (Air Command/Control Squadron of the Year):

MASS-3, 3d MAW

Pete Ross Award (Aviation Safety):

HMLA-369, 3d MAW
